body:
Also adds the latest version and converts to `AutotoolsPackage`.

Previously, `spack install vim ~gui` would still build the GUI (`gvim`) if the X11 libraries were found on your system. Worse yet, both `gvim` and `vim` would link to these libraries. When I tried switching to a different node without the X11 libraries, `vim` didn't work at all for me.
title: Fix vim ~gui behavior
